title: Consider Color Contrast
text: High contrast colors make text and visuals easier to distinguish.

title: Avoid Small Fonts
text: Small font sizes can be difficult for visually impaired individuals to read.

title: Limit Complex Backgrounds
text: Complex backgrounds can make text hard to read for those with visual impairments and also take away from the presentation design.

title: Minimize Animations
text: Detailed animations can be distracting and may not be accessible to all users.
